short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension make it easy to do multiple search queries in 1-click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Configure search engines and search templates to search in 1 search bar.
Then, search anything you want according to your configuration in parallel.
The search opens all the search queries configured in different tabs of chrome, making it easy to do multiple searches with 1-click.
